title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
Can you just get rid of Dominion and all related game modes please.
Thanks to the toxicity of majority of players I only play LoL on weekends for the game modes, I look forward to it.
Nothing to look forward to for this weekend....
because to hell with those of us who actually like dominion and the game modes based on it? league isn't all about you snowflake...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
All hail dominion ;3
I would like to keep dominion for custom games :3
Better be doom bots or your in for hell Riot

Reading these comments is proboably hell for them anyway. Every "rotating game mode queue now live" post they just get a ton of hate. They proboably get hate even when it is urf, from people getting wrecked by zed. I wish people could just let it go and enjoy the rotating queue, it's really sad that you guys can't just accept the gamemodes they make, and have to complain about everything. Please.
tbh i dont even find zed that good in urf, all you have to do is shut him down early
Alright, well fizz then. You get my point anyway.
Riot just never listens to the community. "We are always open to your opinions and we value them". We asked for URF for 3 months and we've been asking for doom bots just as long.

can confirm doom bots on the 20th and it looks pretty crazy really out did themselves this mode 

source:http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/10/104-pbe-update.html#more
Doom Bots?
Probably nemesis{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  draft
no its one we havent seen yet
Doom bots of doom!
Predicted The Future?
Doom bots ples!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Its going to happen {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

You know what? I am tired of those boring game modes. 
The really make me or us interest is URF and Doom Bots. 
I really do hope this freaking game will cooling down maybe one or two years.
Then we can moving on to another game and hoping their producers could listen to the player.
Importantly hoping they better not next“Riot”{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Lets just fix that English for a second before we take that comment into consideration.
Still waiting for doom bots....
That day when you see a ??? on the chart, you're like: hmmm, probably nemesis draft. {{item:3151}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Pls be doom bots!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
DOOM BOTS PLZ
URF+doom-bots plz
better be doom bots or ofa urf ! **BETTER BE** xD

still waiting on normal URF not stupid game mode where im forced to play someone I DONT want to play. like really riot? you say your number one goal is customer satisfaction and to make us have fun but then you force us to play someone we don't want to. yeah mate that's definitely fun.
I think its much better this way. So finally we can play different champs. if not all us will pick our favor picks only {{champion:119}}

have random and not random open at same time, simples


{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} Leave a comment

Yay! Its officially been announced that Doom Bots is coming! Im not sure whether its this RGM queue's ???, but heres the article for proof:

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/10/104-pbe-update.html#doom

Gonna be awesome! Great decision Riot!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
NO URF...
Bring AL URF out more often, and bring Doom Bots out
Bring back normal urf damnit rito!
I dont like dominion and them game modes so you wanna know what I do.......... Don't play them {{champion:432}}
Doom Bots please {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Why is the mode only playable during these time windows rather then just open all the time? Even if there server density is low it shouldn't mean the whole queue has to be disabled.

I se where they are geting at. 20 ot and 27 oct are the best weekends for halloween doom bots
Riot.....{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
{{champion:105}}
Shouldn't warmog be disabled in this mode?

okay guys it could be.... BLACKMARKET, DOOM BOTS, ANY URF VERSION OF A PREMADE ONE. E.G. OFAURF.

OR A PILE OF DISSAPOINT FOR EXAMPLE HEXAKILL ONE FOR ALL.
A new gamemode...cool!
